book.title: Hyperion
book.author: Dan Simmons
book.description: The novel begins with the Consul receiving a message from Hegemony CEO Meina Gladstone that he is to return to the planet Hyperion as a member of the Shrike Pilgrimage.

book.description: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows is a fantasy book written by British author J. K. Rowling and the seventh and final novel of the Harry Potter series.
